new architecture.from sentence: In this paper , we develop a new architecture for dynamically incorporating external background knowledge in NLU models .

supplementary knowledge.from sentence: Rather than relying only on static knowledge implicitly present in the training data , supplementary knowledge is retrieved from external knowledge sources ( in this paper , ConceptNet and Wikipedia ) to assist with understanding text inputs .

input.from sentence: These refined embeddings are then used as input to a task - specific NLU architecture ( any architecture that reads text as a sequence of word embeddings can be used here ) .

initial reading module.from sentence: The retrieved supplementary texts are read together with the task inputs by an initial reading module whose outputs are contextually refined word embeddings ( 3 ) .

initial reading module and the task modu.from sentence: The initial reading module and the task module are learnt jointly , end - to - end .
